name: Birds Aren't Real
description:
A short story-driven psychological horror game.
As a lost traveler, find out what happened to the previous owners of this abandoned house.
The story is inspired by the 1994 novel "The Memory Police" by Yoko Ogawa.

Features:

  • Short duration (30-40 minutes).
  • Psychological Horror.
  • No visual jumpscares.
  • A good story worthy of a read.
